title: Client disconnects in champ select, it says everyone left the lobby
body: I think my client is disconnecting sometimes in champ select, im not sure but whatll happen is the current person that is selecting their timer will just go to 0 and itll just stay there and it says everyone on my team has left the lobby i have to close my client and when i get back on i have a dodge ban and lp loss. I know this isnt my internet because nothing else turns off and i try to go into new tabs and refresh stuff to make sure and everything else is fine.

replies.body: Your network might be having a problem maintain a connection, which can cause you to lose sync and get left behind.  Even if your internet is fine, your connection specifically to the server could be acting up.  I suggest going over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help strengthen your connection.  Let me know if you still have any issues afterwards!
This happens to me and sometimes i get lucky and it reconnects before I pick. Either way this is a serious problem that needs to be fixed I've lost LP over this multiple times.
